Name: Network
Description: Allow you to display your association in a Network

Options.Description: list the scriptname of the objectType and the popOut
list the nodeIDs and the assignGroup
List the groups you want to display when the network is started. Use comma separator

Select the direction of each node. For exemple, processus_niveau_2_20006_883051288,'to'#processus_niveau_2_20005_1079817132,'from'. Use to, if you want the arrow that arrive to this node. Use from, if you want the arrow to leave from this node.
Select Nodes that would be use to filter Node. Use comma separator
